name: Growth360
description: GROWTH360 is founded by Akanksha Malik—a professional with 18 years of global corporate experience in managing complex an diverse projects focused around Recruitment and Learning Development. She has been a member of the leadership team in many of her corporate roles. She has worked with Intel, GE Capital Services, iGate Mastech and Kelly Service (APAC) to name a few. Akanksha has been instrumental in setting up as well as improving HRO processes including RPO for organizations and has in-depth and hands on knowledge of best practices in handling large scale recruitment processes. She has also worked on building diverse and flexible workforce with flexible working arrangements (to suit physically challenged professionals as well as new mothers) in her corporate roles. Akanksha has a passion for working in the social impact sector and has been instrumental in supporting some of the social impact sector projects.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: A boutique executive search firm that helps hire niche and leadership talent for companies that are scaling up.
ShortDescription: 𝗚𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗧𝗛𝟯𝟲𝟬 is a boutique consulting firm that helps connect the dots between business and people goals. We believe people perform best when they are completely aligned with the organization’s DNA and goals. We strive to impact profitability and scalability in organizations by helping attract and grow the “right” talent using optimal business processes.
enhanced_description: Growth360 is a boutique executive search and consulting firm, established in 2014, that connects business and people goals to drive organizational profitability and scalability. The firm specializes in executive search, focusing on hiring niche and leadership talent for companies undergoing rapid growth and scaling up. Growth360 also provides business process consulting and human performance improvement services. Founded by Akanksha Malik, who brings 18 years of global corporate experience in recruitment and learning development, the firm leverages deep expertise in setting up and improving HRO processes, including RPO, and possesses hands-on knowledge of best practices in large-scale recruitment. Growth360's services extend to building diverse and flexible workforces, with a focus on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for their clients.
